Activity: Log in to the database management system, check emails for updates or queries from colleagues.
Review the electronic health record (EHR) data collection progress and identify any inconsistencies.
Send an email to @EHR Vendor Liaison, @Clinical Lead, and @Data Analysts to request the latest data collection reports for the EHR.
Analyze the received EHR data reports and compile a summary of key takeaways.
Prepare for a meeting with colleagues to discuss the trends in the seasonal influenza data.
Participate in a meeting with @Clinical Lead, @EHR Integration Developers, and @Health Informatics Specialists to discuss data trends and findings.
Work on database queries to extract relevant data for the influenza trend analysis.
Check and respond to emails, and finalize notes from the day.
